jsx
Class Configurable

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Container.Layout, Cookie, Group, HttpRemote.Context, Source, Source.Event, VML
public abstract class Configurable
extends Disposable

An abstract base class for configurable objects.

A configurable object typically keeps an ObjectLike object that is initialized in a constructor of the Configurable object and is reconfigurable later.

With the design of this class, its objects are all configurable in any of its subclasses and behave much like what happens in JavaScript.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Detail

Configurable

protected Configurable()

The default constructor that may be invoked in the constructors of the subclasses extending this class.

This constructor does not set the ini field and is only intended to be invoked for the constructors of the subclasses extending this class to access the ini(Configurable) method.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
Configurable(ObjectLike ini), ini(Configurable)

Configurable

protected Configurable(ObjectLike ini)

The typical constructor that may be invoked in the constructors of the subclasses extending this class.

This constructor forces constructors of its subclasses to invoke and pass the initializing objects to it.

Parameters:
ini - The initializing object that can also be created with an object literal (see Initializer).
Since:
1.0
See Also:
Configurable(), ini(Configurable)
Method Detail

ini

protected static final ObjectLike ini(Configurable o)

Gets the configuration data from a configurable object.

Although it is very convenient to access the ini field of a configurable object from the class of the object and its subclasses, this method makes it possible to access the ini field of a configurable object from any subclasses of the Configurable class.

Parameters:
o - The configurable object.
Returns:
The configuration data of the configurable object.
Since:
1.0
See Also:
ini
